sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCheck, faTimes} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' //This class takes in a title and a description and displays them as shown on the homepage class Pricing extends Component { render() { return (

Basic



  Menu from samples
  PDF of Scan Sheet
  Scannable QR Code
  24/7 Web Hosting
  Custom Scan Sheet
  Contactless Tap Tag
  Printed Scan Sheet
  Interactive Menu
  10x Acrylic Sheet Holders


€20

One off Payment
And

€10

A month






Intermediate



  Custom Menu
  PDF of Scan Sheet
  Scannable QR Code
  24/7 Web Hosting
  Custom Scan Sheet
  Contactless Tap Tag
  Printed Scan Sheet
  Interactive Menu
  10x Acrylic Sheet Holders


€40

One off Payment
And

€10

A month






Premium



  Custom Menu
  PDF of Scan Sheet
  Scannable QR Code
  24/7 Web Hosting
  Custom Scan Sheet
  Contactless Tap Tag
  Printed Scan Sheet
  Interactive Menu
  10x Acrylic Sheet Holders


€60

One off Payment
And

€10

A month






); } } export default Pricing;
